course_name: Food and Fibre Case Studies III
description: Through a project focused on a major strategic issue, this course integrates material drawn from discipline based courses & utilises the knowledge & skills developed through Food & Fibre Case Studies I & II. Students in this course complete a semester-long research assignment for a 'client' firm or organisation which is linked to agricultural, pastoral or horticultural industries. This is the capstone course of the Agribusiness degree program.
restricted: BAgribus or BAgribus dual degree students
